languages.text: "Когда я искал Глейто, какой-то человек сказал мне, что город ксеносов необъятен и непостижим. Кажется, я ему в ярости голову свернул — ну, хотя бы не солгал перед смертью".
languages.translation_comment:
Escaped from the arena to other parts of Commorragh.
Idira: "These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"

traits.locale_text: "Когда я искал Глейто, какой-то человек сказал мне, что город ксеносов необъятен и непостижим. Кажется, я ему в ярости голову свернул — ну, хотя бы не солгал перед смертью".

languages.text: "When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."
languages.translation_comment:
Escaped from the arena to other parts of Commorragh.
Idira: "These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"
languages.original_text: "Когда я искал Глейто, какой-то человек сказал мне, что город ксеносов необъятен и непостижим. Кажется, я ему в ярости голову свернул — ну, хотя бы не солгал перед смертью".

traits.locale_text: "When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."
"When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."

"When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."

languages.text: 「グライトを探していた時、ある男がこう言った、異種族の都市は果てしなく、理解不能だと。あのとき俺は怒りに任せて、奴の首をへし折った気がする…だが今ならわかる。奴は嘘をついていなかった」
languages.original_text: "When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトを探していた時、ある男がこう言った、異種族の都市は果てしなく、理解不能だと。あのとき俺は怒りに任せて、奴の首をへし折った気がする…だが今ならわかる。奴は嘘をついていなかった」

languages.text: "Als ich Glaito gesucht habe, hat mir ein Mann gesagt, die Stadt der Xenos sei grenzenlos und nicht zu begreifen. Ich glaube, ich habe ihm im Zorn das Genick gebrochen. Zumindest weiß ich nun, dass er nicht gelogen hat."
languages.original_text: "When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich Glaito gesucht habe, hat mir ein Mann gesagt, die Stadt der Xenos sei grenzenlos und nicht zu begreifen. Ich glaube, ich habe ihm im Zorn das Genick gebrochen. Zumindest weiß ich nun, dass er nicht gelogen hat."

languages.text: « Quand je cherchais Glaito, un homme m'a dit que la ville des xénos était aussi vaste qu'incompréhensible. Je crois que je lui ai tordu le cou dans un accès de colère. Au moins, je sais maintenant qu'il disait vrai. »
languages.original_text: "When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."

traits.locale_text: « Quand je cherchais Glaito, un homme m'a dit que la ville des xénos était aussi vaste qu'incompréhensible. Je crois que je lui ai tordu le cou dans un accès de colère. Au moins, je sais maintenant qu'il disait vrai. »

languages.text: «Cuando estaba buscando a Glaito, un hombre me dijo que la ciudad de los xenos era inabarcable e incognoscible. Creo que le partí el cuello presa de un arrebato de furia; al menos ahora sé que no mentía».
languages.original_text: "When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando estaba buscando a Glaito, un hombre me dijo que la ciudad de los xenos era inabarcable e incognoscible. Creo que le partí el cuello presa de un arrebato de furia; al menos ahora sé que no mentía».

languages.text: “我在找格雷托的时候，有个人告诉我，说这座异形之城无从理解、无边无际。我当时好像一怒之下扭断了他的脖子，但现在我明白了，他没有说谎。”
languages.original_text: "When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."

traits.locale_text: “我在找格雷托的时候，有个人告诉我，说这座异形之城无从理解、无边无际。我当时好像一怒之下扭断了他的脖子，但现在我明白了，他没有说谎。”

languages.text: "Glaito'yu ararken adamın teki, zeno şehri için sınırsız, uçsuz bucaksız demişti. Sonradan kızgınlığıma gelince boynunu kırıvermiştim ama haklıymış."
languages.original_text: "When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito'yu ararken adamın teki, zeno şehri için sınırsız, uçsuz bucaksız demişti. Sonradan kızgınlığıma gelince boynunu kırıvermiştim ama haklıymış."

languages.original_text: "When I was searching for Glaito, a man told me the city of the xenos was boundless and incomprehensible. I think I snapped his neck in a rage — at least now I know he wasn't lying."
